info.name: Enterprise Resource Planning API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) monolithic application. This API provides comprehensive endpoints for managing HR, Payroll, Accounting, Finance, Billing, Procurement, Supply Chain, and Inventory operations.

## Authentication
All endpoints (except health check and API info) require authentication. Include an authentication token in your requests.

## Base URL
Use the `{{baseUrl}}` variable to set your API base URL.

## Modules
- **Human Resources**: Employee and department management
- **Payroll**: Salary processing and tax calculations
- **Accounting**: General ledger and financial transactions
- **Finance**: Budgeting and financial reporting
- **Billing**: Invoicing and customer billing
- **Procurement**: Purchase orders and vendor management
- **Supply Chain**: Shipments and logistics
- **Inventory**: Stock management and automatic reordering

item.name: System

request.description: Check the health status of the ERP service. Returns service status and timestamp.
Get information about the API including version, architecture, available modules, and their relationships.
Get mock statistics for demo purposes when database is not configured.

item.description: System-level endpoints for health checks and API information

item.name: Demo Data

request.description: Get mock employee data for demo purposes
Get mock department data for demo purposes
Get mock payroll records for demo purposes
Get mock transaction data for demo purposes
Get mock budget data for demo purposes
Get mock customer data for demo purposes
Get mock invoice data for demo purposes
Get mock vendor data for demo purposes
Get mock purchase order data for demo purposes
Get mock inventory data for demo purposes
Get mock shipment data for demo purposes

item.description: Demo/mock data endpoints for testing when database is not configured

item.name: Human Resources

request.description: Create a new employee. Requires 'hr_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all employees with optional status filter.
Get a specific employee by ID.
Update an existing employee. Requires 'hr_manager' or 'admin' role.
Terminate an employee. Requires 'hr_manager' or 'admin' role.
Create a new department. Requires 'hr_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all departments.
Get a specific department by ID.
Get HR statistics including active employee count and total departments.

item.description: Human Resources module - Employee and department management

item.name: Payroll

request.description: Process payroll for a single employee. Requires 'payroll_manager' or 'admin' role.
Process payroll for multiple employees in batch. Requires 'payroll_manager' or 'admin' role.
Approve a payroll record. Requires 'payroll_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all payroll records.
Get a specific payroll record by ID.
Get payroll history for a specific employee.

item.description: Payroll module - Salary processing and tax calculations

item.name: Accounting

request.description: Create a new journal entry. Requires 'accountant' or 'admin' role.
Get all accounting transactions.
Get a specific transaction by ID.
Get general ledger entries for a specific account code.
Get the trial balance report showing all account balances.

item.description: Accounting module - General ledger and financial transactions

item.name: Finance

request.description: Create a new budget. Requires 'finance_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all budgets.
Get a specific budget by ID.
Close a budget. Requires 'finance_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get budget utilization details showing spent vs allocated amounts.
Get budget summary for a specific department and fiscal year.
Generate a comprehensive financial report.

item.description: Finance module - Budgeting and financial reporting

item.name: Billing

request.description: Create a new customer. Requires 'billing_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all customers with optional status filter.
Get a specific customer by ID.
Get the current balance for a customer.
Create a new invoice. Requires 'billing_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all invoices with optional filters.
Get a specific invoice by ID.
Send an invoice to the customer. Requires 'billing_manager' or 'admin' role.
Record a payment for an invoice. Requires 'billing_manager' or 'admin' role.
Cancel an invoice. Requires 'billing_manager' or 'admin' role.
Check for overdue invoices. Requires 'billing_manager' or 'admin' role.

item.description: Billing module - Invoicing and customer billing

item.name: Procurement

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Office Supplies Inc",
  "email": "sales@officesupplies.com",
  "phone": "+1-555-0456",
  "address": "456 Vendor St, City, State 12345",
  "paymentTerms": "Net 30",
  "category": "Office Supplies"
}

request.description: Create a new vendor. Requires 'procurement_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all vendors.
Get a specific vendor by ID.
Get performance metrics for a vendor.
Create a new purchase order. Requires 'procurement_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all purchase orders.
Get a specific purchase order by ID.
Approve a purchase order. Requires 'procurement_manager' or 'admin' role.
Place a purchase order with the vendor. Requires 'procurement_manager' or 'admin' role.
Mark a purchase order as received. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Cancel a purchase order. Requires 'procurement_manager' or 'admin' role.

item.description: Procurement module - Purchase orders and vendor management

item.name: Supply Chain

request.description: Create a new shipment. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all shipments.
Get a specific shipment by ID.
Get a shipment by tracking number.
Get all shipments for a specific order.
Dispatch a shipment. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Update shipment status. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Mark a shipment as delivered. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Cancel a shipment. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get performance metrics for a specific carrier.
Get summary of inbound shipments.
Get summary of outbound shipments.

item.description: Supply Chain module - Shipments and logistics

item.name: Inventory

body.raw:
{
  "sku": "ITEM-001",
  "name": "Office Chair",
  "description": "Ergonomic office chair with lumbar support",
  "category": "Furniture",
  "quantity": 100,
  "reservedQuantity": 0,
  "unitPrice": 150,
  "reorderPoint": 20,
  "reorderQuantity": 50,
  "location": "Warehouse A, Aisle 3"
}

request.description: Create a new inventory item. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all inventory items with optional filters.
Get a specific inventory item by ID.
Get an inventory item by SKU.
Update an inventory item. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Adjust stock quantity (positive or negative). Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Reserve stock for an order. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Release previously reserved stock. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Fulfill a reservation by removing stock. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Receive new stock into inventory. Requires 'warehouse_manager' or 'admin' role.
Get all items that are below their reorder point.
Get the total valuation of all inventory.
Get inventory breakdown by category.

item.description: Inventory module - Stock management and automatic reordering
